医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究人员制定策略来识别肠道激素分泌的调节因子由 Hubrecht 研究所和罗氏人类生物学研究所领导的一个多机构研究小组已经制定了识别肠道激素分泌调节剂的策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Researchers-develop-strategies-to-identify-regulators-of-intestinal-hormone-secretion.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Researchers-develop-strategies-to-identify-regulators-of-intestinal-hormone-secretion.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6ec4dd9f-e8e4-4941-9f59-31a42527b20a Fri, 18 Oct 2024 14:13:43 -0400 Researchers develop strategies to identify regulators of intestinal hormone secretion
Waymark 的创新方法可改善医疗补助患者的健康结果Waymark 是一家致力于改善医疗补助医疗服务的获取和质量的公益公司，今天在《新英格兰医学杂志》(NEJM) Catalyst 上发表了一项同行评审研究，评估其早期干预模式在服务第一年的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Innovative-approach-by-Waymark-enhances-health-outcomes-for-Medicaid-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Innovative-approach-by-Waymark-enhances-health-outcomes-for-Medicaid-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0e7c0e2a-2c68-44ca-b503-7d610bff8e2f Fri, 18 Oct 2024 13:17:21 -0400 Innovative approach by Waymark enhances health outcomes for Medicaid patients
新研究揭示阿尔茨海默病的分子机制巴塞罗那大学神经科学研究所 (UBneuro) 的一个研究小组领导了一项研究，描述了一种新的分子机制，该机制影响阿尔茨海默病患者大脑中的 RNA 加工并改变蛋白质合成过程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/New-study-reveals-molecular-mechanism-in-Alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/New-study-reveals-molecular-mechanism-in-Alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4d8ec520-099b-4700-b3a6-d08fc29b4583 Fri, 18 Oct 2024 12:45:00 -0400 New study reveals molecular mechanism in Alzheimer's disease
瑞典成为第一个实现全球艾滋病毒目标的国家卡罗林斯卡学院和其他机构的研究人员在《欧洲监测》杂志上发表的一项研究显示，瑞典已经达到了联合国艾滋病规划署和世界卫生组织制定的艾滋病毒流行目标。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Sweden-becomes-first-country-to-meet-global-HIV-targets.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Sweden-becomes-first-country-to-meet-global-HIV-targets.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=87277e3e-eb1f-4672-ab68-6ba40365108c Fri, 18 Oct 2024 12:24:29 -0400 Sweden becomes first country to meet global HIV targets
排斥土著声音阻碍了拉丁美洲艾滋病毒的进展拉丁美洲的土著社区表示，他们被排除在全球艾滋病毒/艾滋病应对措施之外，导致他们无法获得救生药物和预防工具。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Exclusion-of-indigenous-voices-hinders-HIV-progress-in-Latin-America.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Exclusion-of-indigenous-voices-hinders-HIV-progress-in-Latin-America.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=23b50d46-d062-4dc5-8056-0fa139f5081b Fri, 18 Oct 2024 12:14:38 -0400 Exclusion of indigenous voices hinders HIV progress in Latin America
坐飞机时食物过敏的六个常见误区飞机上的食物过敏与饮食摄入有关，而不是与通风有关。有效的清洁和明确的航空公司政策可以提高旅客的安全。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Six-common-flying-with-food-allergies-myths.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Six-common-flying-with-food-allergies-myths.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=980d7eed-c054-494f-89a0-ff785e0e70e6 Fri, 18 Oct 2024 11:25:00 -0400 Six common flying with food allergies myths
创伤性脑损伤增加阿尔茨海默病风险的分子基础研究结果表明，创伤性脑损伤后 BAG3 的调节可能会减轻 tau 蛋白的积累和认知缺陷，从而成为预防阿尔茨海默病的目标。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/The-molecular-underpinnings-by-which-traumatic-brain-injury-increases-Alzheimers-disease-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/The-molecular-underpinnings-by-which-traumatic-brain-injury-increases-Alzheimers-disease-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6b7c7470-9013-414d-8e51-d7d40b602ec8 Fri, 18 Oct 2024 10:35:00 -0400 The molecular underpinnings by which traumatic brain injury increases Alzheimer's disease risk
Sciensus 任命 Christian Tucat 为首席执行官随着 Christian Tucat 被任命为首席执行官，Sciensus 旨在利用洞察力并扩大其在提供救生药物和疗法方面的全球影响力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Sciensus-names-Christian-Tucat-as-Chief-Executive-Officer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Sciensus-names-Christian-Tucat-as-Chief-Executive-Officer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=de673e4a-3945-4899-a76f-efa3d431d90d Fri, 18 Oct 2024 09:34:00 -0400 Sciensus names Christian Tucat as Chief Executive Officer
科学家绘制了癌症耐药性的遗传图谱所有导致耐药性的癌症突变都属于四类之一。新研究详细介绍了每种类型，有助于发现药物开发的目标并确定潜在的有效二线疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Scientists-map-the-genic-landscape-of-drug-resistance-in-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Scientists-map-the-genic-landscape-of-drug-resistance-in-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=23748eeb-89a6-40e6-85d4-68938cb97ca5 Fri, 18 Oct 2024 07:20:42 -0400 Scientists map the genetic landscape of drug resistance in cancers
经济激励在促进健康生活方式中的作用多运动、戒烟、减肥：伟大的决心，却很难坚持。但如果有经济激励作为回报，事情会变得更容易吗？根据拉德堡德大学等人的研究，它可以成为一种有效的工具，尽管仍然存在一些障碍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/The-role-of-financial-incentives-in-promoting-healthy-lifestyles.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/The-role-of-financial-incentives-in-promoting-healthy-lifestyles.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=895d10e5-0a12-4c5f-92ac-500363792195 Fri, 18 Oct 2024 07:06:50 -0400 The role of financial incentives in promoting healthy lifestyles
